column1: #text=I had a long day at work .
#text=I worked very hard and carried many boxes in the hot weather .
#text=My muscles were sore and I thought a hot bath was just what I needed !
#text=I got home and lit a few candles .
#text=I turned on the hot water , closed the drain in the bathtub and put some bubble bath in there .
#text=As the water rose and the bubbles grew , I got out my bath pillow and stuck the suction cups to the back of the tub .
#text=I turned the water off in the tub , put one foot in at a time , then sank into the hot water and bubbles .
#text=I washed my face and laid back .
#text=I read my book by candlelight and felt my aches melt away into the hot water .
#text=When I was ready to get out of the tub , I opened the drain to let all the water run out .
